name: Low Priority
descr: Minor issue with no immediate impact

name: Medium Priority
descr: Issue affects functionality but workaround available

name: Critical Priority
descr: System outage or data loss risk

name: Resolved
descr: Issue has been fixed and awaiting confirmation

name: Closed
descr: Request or ticket has been completed

name: General Inquiry
descr: Customer has a general question or request

name: Technical Issue
descr: Problem related to system or application

name: Billing Issue
descr: Issue related to invoices or payments

name: Feature Request
descr: Request for a new feature or enhancement

name: Low
descr: Low urgency and low business impact
